subject: Alzheimer's Disease
Football
lead_paragraph: Pat Bowlen, one of the N.F.L.’s longest-serving and most successful owners, relinquished control of the Denver Broncos, which was put in a trust as part of a plan that may lead to control by one of Bowlen’s children.
snippet: Pat Bowlen, one of the N.F.L.’s longest-serving and most successful owners, relinquished control of the Denver Broncos, which was put in a trust as part of a plan that may lead to control by one of Bowlen’s children.
